data.eml:eml: Contribution to the genus Xanthocorus Miyatake (Coleoptera, Coccinellidae, Chilocorini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Wenjing, Chen, Xiaosheng, Wang, Xingmin, Ren, Shunxiang (2015): Contribution to the genus Xanthocorus Miyatake (Coleoptera, Coccinellidae, Chilocorini). ZooKeys 511: 89-98, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.511.9584, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.511.9584
